entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11 except plus 2 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain over southern sections near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 11 except plus 2 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
